name: I Hope She's All Right
Lore: '''I''m afraid that Artoo''s sensors can find no trace of Princess Leia.''',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Your non-unique scouts are forfeit +1. During every draw phase, unless opponent''s character of destiny < 4 occupies a battleground site, opponent loses 1 Force. Effect canceled unless your characters of destiny < 4 occupy two battleground sites.',
